name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword for close combat.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A basic wooden shield for defense.

name: Health Potion
description: Restores 50 HP when consumed.

name: Mana Potion
description: Restores 30 MP when consumed.

name: Roasted Chicken
description: A delicious roasted chicken that restores 20 HP.

name: Bread
description: A loaf of bread that restores 10 HP.

name: Iron Helmet
description: An iron helmet that provides head protection.

name: Leather Armor
description: A set of leather armor for basic protection.

name: Fire Scroll
description: A scroll that casts a fireball spell.

name: Ice Scroll
description: A scroll that casts an ice bolt spell.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile longsword for skilled warriors.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A silver dagger effective against undead.

name: Healing Herb
description: A medicinal herb that restores 30 HP.

name: Antidote
description: Cures poison and restores 20 HP.

name: Mithril Armor
description: Lightweight and durable mithril armor.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: An enchanted bow with increased accuracy.

name: Mana Crystal
description: A crystal that restores 50 MP.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: Grants invisibility for a short duration.

name: Magic Scroll
description: A scroll that casts a random spell.

name: Dragon Scale Shield
description: A powerful shield made from dragon scales.
